name: Farmer's Death
description:
Farmer's Death is a simple third-person farming game. 

you play as the reaper who finally retired & now dives head first into the farm life.

Fix the old farm of pomfret up, care for your animals, & harvest your crops.

Controls:

WASD - Walking

Shift - Sprint 

E - Interact

Tab - Inventory

Esc - Pause

Credits:

Made in Unreal Engine, Blender, Substance Painter & Designer.

Sounds are from WeLoveIndies & Epidemic.

The flowers & water texture are from the "Stylized - Dynamic Nature" pack from the unreal engine marketplace.

& thank you to all the teachers & other peeps, who helped me on the way!
